DOC.brief_summary: In Denmark western world , increase prevalence obesity probably due combination inadequate daily physical activity high energy intake . One approach achieve weight loss change life style participate intensive supervise prolonged life style modification course . The immediate effect often positive , time overall effect limit majority maintain weight loss change life style . The purpose study therefore characterize physiological factor determine/influence capacity maintain weight loss healthy lifestyle prolong lifestyle intervention . The investigator follow research question : 1 . Are physiological trait characteristic mediate good adherence lifestyle change weight loss ? 2 . Does adaptation muscle oxidative capacity lifestyle intervention predict success maintain weight loss lifestyle change ? 3 . How gender age influence capacity maintain lifestyle induce adaptation muscle adipose tissue maintain weight loss ? The study design cross-sectional base lifestyle intervention , practice real life set Ubberup folk high school . The investigator recruit former participant lifestyle style intervention . 50 % maintain weight loss healthy life style 50 % .
DOC.brief_title: Physiological Factors That Influence Maintenance Lifestyle Changes Weight Loss - Cross-sectional Study
